description: Allows the user to transform into a perfect physical copy of anyone they have touched, including their face, body, and voice. The transformation is so complete that even those close to the original cannot tell the difference.

users.circumstances: Mr. 2 Bon Clay consumed the fruit at some point before his introduction

abilityReveals.description: Mr. 2 demonstrates the fruit's devastating strategic potential by perfectly impersonating King Cobra, complete with voice and mannerisms, fooling an entire city including the king's subjects.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Mr. 2 impersonates King Cobra and makes a public confession about using Dance Powder, catalyzing the civil war as part of Operation Utopia.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
Transformation requires physical touch of the target first

strengths.strength: Perfect physical transformation indistinguishable from the original
strengths.description: The transformation is so complete that it can fool entire populations and even those who know the target personally.

description: Allows the user to turn any part of their body into steel blades, from transforming fingers into razor-sharp knives to reshaping arms and legs into giant cleavers. The user's body becomes a living weapon.

users.circumstances: Daz Bonez (Mr. 1) consumed the fruit at some point before his introduction as a Baroque Works officer agent

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Body parts can become steel blades for offense and defense
strengths.description: Can transform any part of the body into sharp blades, making the user extremely dangerous in close combat.

description: Allows the user to grow spikes from any part of their body. The user can freely control the size, sharpness, and number of spikes. Perfect for both offense and defense, as the spikes are not only sharp but also extremely durable.

users.circumstances: Zala (Miss Doublefinger) consumed the fruit at some point before her introduction as a Baroque Works officer agent

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Can grow spikes from any body part for piercing attacks
strengths.description: User can extend sharp, durable spikes to pierce through solid stone walls and put holes in opponents.
